papers.title: Status of the PAL-XFEL
authors: The construction of the PAL-XFEL was completed at the end of 2015 and the FEL commissioning started from the beginning of 2016. The commissioning aims for the lasing of 0.5 nm FEL in the first campaign by July 2016
and for the lasing of 0.1 nm hard X-ray FEL in the second campaign by December 2016. The commissioning results of the 0.5 nm FEL lasing will be presented.
papers.abstract: Slides FR2A01 [92.474 MB] reference for this paper ※ https://doi.org/10.18429/JACoW-
